titleStmt.title: The Christian tutor, or, A free and rational discourse of the sovereign good and happiness of man, and the infallible way of attaining it, especially in the practice of Christian religion written in a letter of advice to Mr. James King in the East-Indies / by Henry Jenkes ... ; and now published for the benefit of all others.
titleStmt.author: Jenkes, Henry, d. 1697.
King, James.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Faithorne, and John Kersey ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
